title: Detect Thoughts
content:

Level 2 Divination Spell

Focus your mind to read the thoughts of certain creatures while talking to them.

Detect Thoughts is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Detect Thoughts is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Divination school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Detect Thoughts Information

Description: Focus your mind to read the thoughts of certain creatures while talking to them. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Divination School Casting Time: Action Duration: Until Long Rest Range: - Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Detect Thoughts

Detect Thoughts can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One, Circle of the Spores Detect Thoughts can be cast by using the following Items: Uncovered Mysteries

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One, Circle of the Spores

Uncovered Mysteries

Detect Thoughts Tips & Notes

Detect Thoughts is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. You will get the option to use it in conversations if the spell is prepared.
